description: Default Issue Analyst prompt
agent: Issue Analyst
---

Create `analysis.md` for the following bug report:

- What happened?: <what-happened>
- How to reproduce:
	- Version: <version>
	- Command: <command>
	- Then: <steps-to-reproduce>
- Where are you viewing the output?: <Skip | GitHub | Azure DevOps | GitLab | Local viewer (VS Code, etc.) | Other>
- Relevant output (sanitized): <relevant-output>
- Additional context: <additional-context>
